TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileLoadException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 找到托管程序集但不能加载时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a managed assembly is found but cannot be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示发生的错误时文件找到，但无法加载。Represents the error that occurs when a file is found but cannot be loaded. 文件无法加载，因为找不到它时引发异常。The exception is thrown when the file fails to load because it cannot be located. 如果该文件所在的但不能加载由于权限不足，引发。If the file is located, but cannot be loaded due to insufficient permissions, a is thrown. `FileLoadException` 具有默认 COR_E_FILELOAD HRESULT，它具有值 0x80131621，但这不是唯一可能的 HRESULT。`FileLoadException` has the default HRESULT of COR_E_FILELOAD, which has the value 0x80131621, but this is not the only possible HRESULT. 如果你的代码不具有权限，该错误消息的此异常可能仅包含文件或目录的名称，而不是完全限定路径。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths. > [!NOTE] > 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它将引发的某些成员。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在这种情况下捕获的异常，编写`catch`语句相反。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead. **相关的提示****Associated Tips** **请确保该文件是有效的.NET Framework 程序集。****Make sure that the file is a valid .NET Framework assembly.** 如果文件不是有效的 .NET Framework 程序集，则会引发此异常。This exception is thrown if the file is not a valid .NET Framework assembly. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . **检查以确保程序集或模块不加载两次用两个不同的证据。****Check to make sure an assembly or module was not loaded twice with two different evidences.** 证据是输入安全策略决策的一组信息（如代码可授予哪些权限）。Evidence is the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions, such as what permissions can be granted to code. 有关详细信息，请参见和For more information, see and **如果使用或方法，检查以确保程序集名称不超过系统定义的最大长度。****If using the or methods, check to make sure the assembly name is not longer than the system-defined maximum length.** 程序集名称的长度不能超过系统定义的最大值。The assembly name's length cannot exceed the system-defined maximum. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . **如果加载附属程序集，请确保指定的 CultureInfo 与文件的 CultureInfo 匹配。****If loading a satellite assembly, make sure the specified CultureInfo matches the file's CultureInfo.** 附属程序集包含本地化资源，这些资源包含单个区域性（用作默认或非特定区域性）的非本地化可执行代码和资源。Satellite assemblies contain localized resources which contain non-localizable executable code and resources for a single culture that serve as the default or neutral culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

param.name: message

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 内部异常的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例使用的属性`message`并属性使用`fileName`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message` and the property using `fileName`. 属性的新实例初始化为`null`。The property of the new instance is initialized to `null`. 不需要为存储在磁盘; 上的文件它可以是系统的支持访问流的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，具体取决于系统，此类可能无法访问物理设备。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 不需要为存储在磁盘; 上的文件它可以是系统的支持访问流的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，具体取决于系统，此类可能无法访问物理设备。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 内部异常的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

value.span: 一个 ，包含具有无效图像的文件的名称；或者，如果没有将文件名传递给当前实例的构造函数，则为空引用。

span.span: A containing the name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有，则此属性返回为当前实例的构造函数提供的文件的名称。This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any. 如果文件名未指定或为空引用，此属性将返回 null 引用。If the file name was not specified or is a null reference, this property returns a null reference. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取错误消息和引发此异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

value.span: 包含错误消息和引发此异常的文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代。This property overrides . 如果没有消息提供给当前异常的构造函数，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果属性不为空引用，该消息包含文件名，例如，"无法加载文件`FileName`。"If the property is not a null reference, the message includes the file name, for example, "Unable to load file a `FileName`." (`FileName`表示返回的值。)如果是`null`，在为"(null)"的系统提供的消息指示这一点。(a `FileName` represents the value returned by .) If is `null`, this is indicated in the system-supplied message as "(null)". 系统提供的消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。The system-supplied message takes into account the current system culture. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回当前异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of the current exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 一个字符串，它包含此异常的完全限定名，还可能包含错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪（取决于所使用的 构造函数）。

span.span: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace, depending on which constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包含异常的值的名称的值属性，并因调用。The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果任何这些成员为空引用，它的值不包含在返回的字符串。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
